title: Stylized serif on Threadslike
content:
Can anyone ID this stylized serif on [Threadslike](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181039/http:/threadslike.com/)? I'm a fan of the little curls and extra touches in this typeface.

Font: 

 Domaine Display 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181039/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [stylized-serif.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181039/http:/typophile.com/files/stylized-serif.jpg) | 112.71 KB |
author: tylor.reimer

comments.content:
Looks like: Klim Type Foundry-Kris Sowersby/Domaine Display Medium  
 [https://klim.co.nz/retail-fonts/domaine-display/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181039/https:/klim.co.nz/retail-fonts/domaine-display/ "https://klim.co.nz/retail-fonts/domaine-display/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181039im_/http:/typophile.com/files/flan1_4941.jpg)
Great find DPape. Looks like there is also quite a nice text size version of that font.
